speech: I understand, stress can take a toll. In Ayurveda, practices like daily meditation, herbal teas like Brahmi, and warm oil massages can help alleviate stress. Remember to take breaks and prioritize self-care.

Maintaining a balanced lifestyle is crucial for mental well-being. Ayurveda recommends daily routines, yoga, and herbs like Ashwagandha for stress relief. Consider incorporating these practices into your routine.
